text: Masih sama seperti tahun lalu, ayamnya enak, klo udh malem bagian paha cepat habis, minusnya ga bisa bayar transferr atau qris, hanya bisa cash. Tempat lebih kecil daripada yg satu lg

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Thea Priestiashanti
text: Lumayan rame..blm jam 12 sdh abis aja pahanya.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Nurwita Trihendraningrum
text:
Ini ayam goreng Semarang dgn cita rasa khas. Ayamnya empuk dan bumbu menyerap sampai ke dalam daging ayam 👌👌👌
Kalo sop buat sy ya sop pada umumnya.....
Antrian ke tempat makan cukup lumayan nih di hari kerja. Sy datang pukul 2 aja bs antri di no 3.
Kalo dr harga ya mid range lah ya...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: W K
text: Ayam goreng dan soup sapi mantap. Rame tp cepat utk dapat duduknya. Ayamnya dengan bumbu meresap kedagingnya. Soup sapi dengan daging yg empuk

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dany Gunawan
text: Rasanya cukup enak. Harganya premium. Kalo makan di tempat ngantri lama banget, mungkin lagi liburan taun baru, kalo dibungkus langsung.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Linda Wulandari
text: Ayam kampung tapi ga alot, panas2 langsung disajiin pake nasi+sambel superrrr nikmat!! Sambelnya tipikal sambal yg aku suka, pedes manis!! Sayang banget sop buntutnya abis, tinggal sayurnya aja which is surprisingly still goood!!! Ambience nya standar rumah makan dan agak panas. Rame banget smp ambil antrian buat masukny.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Edwin
text:
Sop Buntutnya the best ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Ayam gorengnya ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ ini tipe ayam goreng yang agak sedikit basah ( tidak kering )
sambalnya ada 2 macam kalau ga salah, saya favorit yang sambal bawang. Tempatnya selalu ramai apalagi weekend dan weekdays di jam makan siang. Lets try guys, pelayanannya ramah !

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: AβįƐ ꧁༺AL༻꧂
text: Enak ayamnya empuk nasinya wangi sop sapi nya sedap sambelnya ok apalagi yg kurang👌

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ario Doank
text: Best ayam goreng with sambel bawang. Taste is salty in good way

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: imron rosidin
text: ayamnya empuk banget, sambelnya ada beberapa pilihan, sopnya jg maknyuuuus

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sany Aldilah
text: Makanannya enak dan pelayanannya ramah serta cepat.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Rini Lukita
text: Datang  sore tapi antri panjang, mungkin karena saat liburan sekolah. Antrian teratur dan cepat. Ambil nomor antrian, duduk sambil ditemani 'live music'. Tidak ada menu, langsung pesan ayam goreng, ati ampela, sop buntut plus sambal bawang. Ayam gorengnya empuk, gurih, basah (tidak digoreng kering). Sambal bawangnya pedas

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sairoh Ashmitha
text:
Pertama kali ke Ayam Goreng Pak Supar dan sumpah ini enak buanget! Wangi ayamnya terendus dari radius 200 meter terus rasanya nagih parah.

Terus sop dagingnya juga duh nggak usah ditanya lah, saling melengkapi satu sama lain. Sambelnya? Duh, masa perlu dijelasin lagi. Pokoknya kalo ke Semarang wajib banget nget nget nget buat makan disini.

Asli, sebahagia itu abis makan disini! ❤️

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Merry Christin Manafe
text:
Ayam gorengnya empuk, rasanya meresap sampai ke dalam, kulit luarnya ga digoreng sampai terlalu kering, jadi ga keras. (rating 9/10)
Sambalnya tidak terlalu pedas buat penyuka pedas dan rasanya sedikit manis. Kalau penyuka pedas, bisa tambah sambal mentahnya, nampol beut lah.
Kami kehabisan sop iga, jadi hanya bisa icip² kuahnya sama isi wortelnya aja. Tapi dari kuahnya aja bisa disimpulkan ini enak... 😍 (rating 9/10)
Service cepat, meja dibersihkan dengan cepat, pelayannya sigap semua.
Will I go back to this place? Yes. Will I recommend this place? Yes

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Theresia Reta
text: Selalu rame jam makan siang. Porsinya pas, kuahnya light dan seger banget. Sate tempe nya enak, banyak macem gorengan dan sate” an juga harga tergolong murah.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Prasetyo Harjanto
text:
untuk bisa menikmati menu resto ini,diperlukan kesabaran...
resto yg selalu rame pengunjung..
setelah datang,jangan lupa langsung ambil antrian untuk tempat duduk..
sambil nunggu antrian,sekalian jajan rujak atau tahu gejrot di sebelah resto..

ayam goreng nya gurih,bumbu meresap..
bonus sambal merah dan timun..

sop daging sapi nya mantab,porsi besar,isian daging banyak,potongan daging besar dan empuk,kuah berasa kaldu..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sandi Aji
text:
Sering ke Semarang tapi baru kali ini mampir nyobain.

Sob buntutnya habis tapi sop iga dan dagingnya gak kalah enak, tetelannya empuk gurih maknyussa... Kuahnya pas gak berlebihan rempah tapi cocok banget di lidah.

Ayam gorengnya mirip ayam pop, tapi rasanya enak banget empuk berbumbu pas, dicocol sambel terasi pake kecap khas semarang wahhhh nikamt banget di mulut.

Ampela dan atinya empuk banget kayaknya direbus dulu sebelum digoreng mateng jadinya empuk berbumbu gurih lezat!!!

Ada juga sambal bawang buat yang gak suka terasi, enak sambel dadak pedas gurih.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: nafla baswedan
text: ke sini hampir isya’ di hari minggu, jadi agak antri dikit. ayam gorengnya dah pasti juara😍 sop dagingnya juga enak, seger. se porsi sop dagingnya 60rb bisa buat ramean, untuk ayamnya 20an, nasi 6rb. kalo pengen kuah sopnya ajaa juga bisa! mantap, semoga tempatnya bisa segera lebih luas..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Anindya Liani
text: ayam gorengnya meski pucet gini rasanya gurih, enak bangeeett.. sambelnya juga mantep pol. tp klo kemaleman, udah kehabisan sop buntut. kalau ditawarin sop+sayurnya aja better ga usah beli, krn isinya cuma kuah ama wortel 😅

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: bagus prihatin
text: Ayam goreng paling favorit, satu ga akan cukup...Ini model ayam goreng yang dibumbu kuning, bumbunya ringan gurih banget, tekstur lembut dan kenyel ayamnya masih kerasa, beda dengan model ayam goreng ungkepan yang sampe lengket dan ayamnya terlalu empuk banget, biasanya ayam disajikan dalam gorengan yang ga terlalu kering tapi bagi penikmat ayam goreng kering bisa request, ayam goreng sudah ada sambal dan lalapan timun, tapi bila ingin sambal bawang atau sambal terasi atau pete bisa dipesan...Oiya disini juga menyediakan sop buntut, sopnya kuahnya biasa saja menurut saya, dagingnya empuk, lumayan buat sajian pendamping yang berkuah...Untuk harga memang diatas rata2 tapi sangat recommended!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Winasista Salarina
text: Ayam gorengnya paling special dan rasanya ghrih enak. Sambal bawangnya rekomen banget ditambah nasi panas dijamin nambah. Plus sop buntut jg enak dan segar

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: christine arieska
text: Ayam gorengnya gurih, sambalnya gak pedas cenderung manis. Tempatnya kecil, parkirannya agak challenging. Dua porsi nasi, 2 ayam, 2 es jeruk, 1 sop sayur total 99 ribu.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Hartono Wijaya
text: Ayam gorengnya berasa gurih. Enak. Beda dengan ayam goreng lainnya. Rasa sop buntut juga ok.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Lina Cioko
text:
Mantap enakk sop buntut nya tidak berbau. Dan ayamnya empuk.
antri tapi masih cepat dapat tempat. Pelayanannya sangat cepat

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Devie Re
text: Overall enaaak bangets, perpaduan ayam goreng plus sambelnya lezat.. jgn lupa sop buntut dicoba.. daging empuk seger kuahnya..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Gustiawan Godi
text: Datang langsung duduk saja, pelayan akan cepat menghampiri. Biasanya saat jam makan siang sangat ramai. Ayam gorengnya empuk dan sup dagingnya juga empuk enak. Ada pemain musik didepan warung yg suaranya cukup besar dan suara obrolan anda tak terdengar - untung lagu-lagunya enak didengar.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Didit Hardiyanto
text: Selalu jadi menu wajib dan favorit setiap trip lewat Semarang. Ayamnya enak, bumbu nya natural, rasanya ga lebay, ayam kampung, sambalnya pedas menggelegar, fresh baru dimasak ketika dipesan. The best !!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Danang Widayat
text:
Beeuuuhhhh....ga ada yang ga enak. Sambelnya ada 2 macam...ttrus dimakan pake nasi anget dan Ayam gorengg.....duuhh...dduuhhh nikkhh maatt tennann....trus sop iga'nya??? Aaaddduuhhhh dagingnya emppuuxx....
Makannya kudu antri ya. Kudu sabar pokoknya.

Selamat menikmati!!!!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Fathina Azizah
text: Bagi yang lebih suka ayam goreng kering, jangan lupa request karena disini tipe yang goreng basah. Karyawan ramah sekali, rasanya gurih, sambalnya enak.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: H.Sofyan Purnama,SE
text: Makanan sih mantap.. pelayanan yg lambat, dan kadang kurang ramah pelayan nya

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dessy Sagita
text: Makanan yg nyaman, ayamnya yg gurih pas banget sama sambel bawangnya ditutup dengan sop dagingnya yg puanasssss puassss 😋😋

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yanti Wu
text: menunya cm ayam sm sop aja tp rame bgt , tp pelayanannya cpt , ayamnya wangi .

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Velika Wijaya
text: Enak banget ayamnya dan sop nya. Bumbunya ngeresap di ayam. Krn ayam kampung jd agak sedikit dagingnya. Sup nya jg enak. Tp agak mahal 65k untuk sup. Ayamnya 26k per pcs

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kikie Briyo
text:
Tugas ke semarang mampir disini. Tapi ada sedikit pengalaman menggelitik, ketika makan disini saya makan berdua sama rekan kantor, kita pesan makan di tempat dan pesan juga untuk dibungkus nasi ayam 6 bungkus. Selesai makan saat mau bayar dihitung tuh di kertas kosong angka2 aja. Lalu kita bayar, tapi karena untuk di rembes rekan kerja saya minta bon nya, tapi pelayannya yg ngitung tadi bingung buat jabarin pesanan kita, padahal di bon itu ada menu-menu nya. Wkwkwkwk

Ywd deh di bon nya cuma langsung di tulis totalnya aja, gak dirinci. Rekan kerja saya ngerasa ada yg gak beres sama pelayan ini, cuma karena gak tega buat malu orang jadi dia abaikan aja.
Semoga yg kerja di sini kalau baca komen ini bisa buat pembelajaran. Bukan seperti itu cara melayani pelanggan, klo ketemu pelanggan yg kritis trus bawel kan berabe.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Abdul Rohman
text: Pertama kali datang harus antri, ayam goreng ekspektasi kita goreng kering ternyata goreng basah, tp rasanya enak menyerap hingga kedalam" dan tulangnya

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Edvyn Tanu
text: Sop Buntutnya lumayan enak, empuk dan gak pelit. Ayamnya terbaik dan sambelnya enak juga. Recommended pokoknya

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Roy Anthony
text: Sop Buntut dan Ayam nya cukup enak. Rasanya khas semarang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sonny Ardi
text:
​I recently visited Ayam Goreng Pak Supar, and it was a fantastic experience. The place has a charmingly casual and cozy atmosphere, with a wall adorned with logos of European football clubs, giving it a unique, personal touch. The serving speed was impressive—my food was brought out quickly and efficiently.
​The real star of the show is the "kampung chicken." It was incredibly soft and tender, cooked to perfection, and had a delicious, savory flavor. I really liked the unique pricing system where you pay per piece, allowing you to customize your meal. The chicken paired perfectly with the variety of sambal options, which were served in small red bowls. This is a must-visit spot for anyone who loves flavorful, tender chicken in a welcoming environment.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Lathifatul Ulya
text: The fried chicken is crispy and flavorful, with the seasoning soaking right into the meat. The chili sauce has just the right level of spiciness and keeps you coming back for more! Portions are generous, prices are affordable. The place is simple but clean, and the service is quick and friendly. Perfect for lunch or takeaway

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Delvy G
text:
A very well known local restaurant in Semarang if you are looking for local food. The place is ok but quite small and please expect a long queue if you are coming here during lunch.

The food is great where they uniquely serves a few pieces of chicken and their gizzards, you just as many chicken you want and left the ones you don’t want on the plate. You do need to order the Beef Soup if you want it though. They also have a few types of chilies that you may want to order them

The taste was great, so tasteful and feels fresh! You may need to add a portion of rice if you like to eat plenty of food.

Service is nice, but this is a warung styled place so don’t expect too much.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: phimatra jaya
text: Absolutely delicious! The fried chicken was crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside, and the sambal was a real winner—spicy but addictive. The beef soup was incredibly tender and flavorful. Lucky there was no line when I came, so I got my food right away. Definitely coming back again!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Weanny Hikmat
text:
If you’re in Semarang and craving local pride then the Ayam Goreng Pak Supar is a must-try. The chicken is absolutely delicious — tender, juicy, and packed with flavor. One piece is simply not enough! What really elevates it is the sambal bawang — spicy, punchy, and the perfect partner for the savory chicken.

Don’t miss the extras either — the pete(stinky beans), chicken liver, and gizzard are flavorful additions if you’re into them. While the soup served alongside is tasty, I personally keep coming back for the chicken.

Just a heads-up: they only accept cash, so come prepared.
Definitely a local gem worth visiting!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: William Morris
text: I am just visiting Semarang and saw this place from many post on social media. The place was delicous. Great tasting Ayam goreng and very tender sop buntut. I recommend this place if you are in Semarang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: c ayu
text: Kinda hard to find parking spot but still got it at the end. I really like their chicken menu, easy to eat, familiar taste, and not really hard to chew. The beef soup is good but I didn't really think there is something special in it. Love it since there are many vegetables inside, especially carrot and potato cubes. Their sambal is also tasty. For the beverage, try their squeezed orange juice, it is good. Overall recommended.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dewi Andriani
text: Waiting list but there is a place to wait. The food came quickly.we ordered beef soup, the meat so tender and the soup was so good. The fried kampong chicken is excellent and soft. Very recommended . They just accept cash payment.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Agni Isa Ambara
text: Everything about the fried chicken is great. Dont forget the beef soup

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Harta Widjaja
text: Best chicken ever!! Always here whenever I pass Semarang. Will never get satisfied. Worth every penny!!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: bundapiknik
text:
Be prepared for a long queue if you visit on the weekend, and don’t forget to bring cash, as they don’t accept QRIS or bank transfers.

The meat broth is rich and flavorful, with a deep vegetable-infused taste. You can choose between meat soup or vegetable soup, depending on your preference.

The fried chicken is incredibly tender, with well-seasoned flavors that soak right into the meat—absolutely delicious!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kevin Christonar
text: their chicken are very tender, not the type of crunchy deep fried chicken but more likely "ayam ungkep" style. shallow fry but the spices are there and seep into the chicken. their oxtail soup also good. the only downside about this place is they only take cashes. so prepare your idr bill peeps

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kristina Kurniawati Santoso
text:
When we got there, we had to queue to sit. Not taking too long at that time, they provide plastic stool to wait outside.
The chicken was great, they served the rice first, and asked if you want sop buntut (oxtail soup). Then the rice and soup came first. The chicken took sometimes later to serve.

They gave us the chicken, not to crispy, not to dry, like half-cooked fried, the chicken looks pale, but taste great with sambal terasi and sambal bawang. You have to pay Rp 5000,- for sambal bawang, served on small "cobek" (stone grinder, i guess). Sambal terasi served on small plate, and it's free.

Later when we have done eating then we knew that they also serve "ayam goreng garing" (crispy fried chicken), looks good.

Cost 250K rupiah for 4 chicken, 1 chicken soup, rice, and some drink.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: TTHP
text: Lovely fried chicken and soup. Taste pretty clean, not so heavy without a lot of spices

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Jiacmilia Salim
text:
I had heard from several friends that dining at Pak Supar's place involves long queues, so I planned to arrive right when they opened. They open at 10 AM, and I arrived at 9:45 AM. I was quite lucky to find one empty table that I could take right away.

They strictly serve only fried chicken and oxtail soup—no vegetables or other side dishes. They ask how many pieces of chicken you want. Each staff member has a specific duty: some handle the chicken, others the rice, soup, and drinks.

The fried chicken is delicious and savory, perfectly complementing the rice. Don't forget to order the sambal bawang; it's spicy, tasty, and adds a great kick.

Parking is relatively easy, but it can be challenging to find a spot when it's crowded.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Crochet X
text:
First time here, we were surprise by the long queue for dine-in. We had to take our queue number. The restaurant is not very big. For takeouts, they can immedialy serve you. Once we got a table, they served us very quickly. Their main menu is Ayam Goreng and Sop Buntut. They would put the Ayam Goreng on the table and will count how many you ate at the end. For soup, you'd have to order.
The food were really good. No wonder there's so many people queuing.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: ridone ko
text: Came here from Google recommendation. It was lunchtime when I reached Semarang city. They offer fried chicken and beef stew soup. What makes it different from the rest of fried chicken in general is that the meat is not fried till crispy but still tender outside and inside. Very tasty and definitely 1 is not gona be enough

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Lusman Yunarto
text: Bit of a line during Wed lunch hour, had to wait 15 mnts. Once we sat down the only question was how many rice and soup 🤔😅 means they will put down a plate of chicken on the table and we eat & pay what we want. The beef soup was tasty but meat bit too chewy. Chicken was tasty but not crispy fried, their style was more similar to Jakarta's ayam pop. Still good but just different, chili on the sweet side.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ghani Wal Arif
text: One of the best traditional fried chicken in Semarang, they had a great chicken with soft texture and tasty meat soup.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yeny Maria
text:
This fried chicken restaurant is legend among the locals. The chicken is not crispy fried with flour. Chicken is fried not too dry therefore not crispy like you would presume.

I have eaten here twice during my trip to Semarang. This place is always packed and crowded. The sambal ( chilli ) is very delicious as well as complimenting the chicken very well. This place is recommended to be in your list as a foodie when you visit this city.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Banuaji P
text: Nice food and service. But this place litte hot inside. The chicken is good and moist. The sambal is good also. The soup is good and the meat is so soft.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: irwan lim limhukpau
text: Amazing! 😍 If you want to try this, be prepared to queue up. 🎟️ Everyone must use a queue number. The chicken is so soft and the soup is delicious. 😋 Highly recommended for anyone visiting Semarang! 👍 #MustTry #FoodieHeaven #SemarangEats

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Zahrina Atikah
text: You must to try in here if you go Semarang. This food is very delicious. Rice 6K, Chicken 25K, Empela 5K, Sop Buntut / daging 60K, Jeruk 8K, Es Teh 4K. Service friendly, and faster although you must patient, and parkir area small. But no problem because appropriate 🥰

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Freddy Samad
text:
Traditional fried chicken, nothing fancy but the chicken is quite succulent and the meat is tender. The chicken ovals are also fresh and have a good bite to it. They all go well with the sambel cabe but unfortunately the cabe isn't that spicy. The beef soup is good, the broth is what I expect a good beef broth would be. The beef meat itself doesn't have much flavor but tender enough to be eaten along the broth.

Place is small and almost always crowded even during off time. Once you reach the street you basically can pinpoint where it is from many parked cars around it. Price is quite fair and affordable.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Daniel Cahyadi
text: Toppp.. bebek goreng Josss.. opor bebek josss... sambal markotop

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Astin Dermawan
text: Selera asin pasti sukaa.. berhubung sy lbh suka manis, jd makanan bintang 4 aja.. panas hanya pakai kipas angin.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Muliyanto Halim
text:
Fried chicken is juicy, soft and delicious. The rice is also high quality.
We came here on Friday around 12:30. It’s already full and we need to queue for half hour. But once you get table, the service is very fast.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ginda Pamela
text:
Its good, though the Sop Daging is too expensive for a Semarang-level food. Im from Jakarta, yet I still feel the Sop Daging is too expensive. The ratio of the taste and price of the Sop Daging is just not match.

The Ayam Goreng is good though, make sure to request them to re fry it to make it crispy.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Antonius F
text: For first-time visitors, Pak Supar's fried chicken deserves 5 stars, the oxtail soup has a distinctive taste and aroma, overall their menu is worth a try and you will love it.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Anjani Disti
text:
The fried chicken was sooooooo good! The chicken was very tender and you definitely can taste the spices down to the bone. Their sambal was amazing too because it has this perfect level of spicyness to elevate the whole dish. The oxtail soup was another level because the broth was clear but very thick in flavor. The oxtail was tender and huge.

Definitely will come back again for some more

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: theodora regina
text:
Must visit ayam goreng in Semarang!
Kind of traditional home made local chicken.
💰28.000 / portion (chicken)
💰40.000 / soup

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ramadhani A.S
text: buat yang ga suka ayam pun bilang enak

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: vandersulai
text:
If you are in Semarang, you all have to try this place! They had simple food in options, I loved spicy things and this place is to go. They charge you whatever you have already order.
The waiter just gives us a whole pack of grilled chicken which is so delicious, I add up with rice and beef soup. It was the greatest meal I had in Semarang. The place is a little bit cramped and not too hygienic, but this describes what culinary in different towns looks like. With rich savory food and spicy food all at once.

If I went to Semarang again, this is a must go place for sure!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: elmo rinaldi
text: One of the most delicious ayam kampung goreng I’ve tried. The oxtail is superb too. I always add portion for rice everytime I eat here. The sambal is really great too! Dont forget to order ati ampela and petai here. Dont come at lunch or dinner time, if you dont want to wait for seat.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Mahesa Shine
text:
The food was amazing! We had the chicken and the oxtail soup the meat was extra tender and the sambal taste really good!!

The only problem was you have to remind the server of your order because when I was there they forgot my one of my orders but they give it immediately

Parking space are limited, but you will find a spot nevertheless

If you are in Semarang, this is one of the recommended places to go!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Jeanne
text:
Ayam Goreng Pak Supar is a traditional eatery in Semarang with a specialty in fried chicken and beef soup/tails. Its comfortable setting and delicious food make it a great spot for enjoying traditional food like ayam goreng and sup daging/buntut in Kendal. Make sure to give this eatery a try if you're ever in Kendal and craving some delicious fried chicken and soup from a traditional eatery.
When you come to Ayam Goreng Pak Supar in Semarang, you will be served 8 pieces of fried chicken immediately after being sat down at a table. After that, you will be asked how much rice and soup (beef or tail) you would like to consume. They will then offer you pete goreng. Finally, they will ask what you would like to drink. This traditional eatery offers a hassle-free dining experience with delicious fried chicken and soup, so be sure to drop by and give it a try.
If you prefer a specific type of fried chicken, you can simply inform the staff on arrival and they will accommodate your request accordingly. This ensures you will enjoy the fried chicken of your choice and customize your meal to your liking.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Awang5
text:
One of popular food in Semarang which only served 2 menu, Ayam Goreng and Oxtail Soup.

The chicken is very oily, yes I agree by many testimonials, but the taste wise still good to have.

The Oxtail Soup has many meats inside also the sliced carrots & potato. Served hot and best to eat while its hot too.

Queuing most of the times, since the tables are also limited. You could have the MH Thamrin if you don't want to wait too long.

Payment only CASH, no QRIS, card, or other payment method.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Muhammad Asrar Amir
text: It's very addictive! It doesn't look very appealing but once you try, you can't stop taking the chicken and when you realize you don't have chicken anymore! Spice also quite nice. Worth the orice

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Andika putri
text: Good ayam goreng. Specially the sambal. And ordered sop and turns out the meat was so tender. Love it

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Biteorbye
text: go during non peak hours to avoid the crowd. the chicken is well-seasoned paired with sambal that is more on the sweeter side. comfort food at its finest.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: dhamar pramudhito
text:
The chicken is heavenly good!!
I could eat it again again and again.
Remember folks to order 2, because one will never be enough!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kastan YT
text: Went here for the amazing review, didn't disappoint. Super duper tasty! Chicken is a bit on the skinny side, but the seasoning made up for it. Oxtail soup is very flavourful, not that much but enough to sate your appetite. 10/10 would return.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Eleora
text: I am always happy when it comes to fried chicken, and I do happy and satisfied with this fried chicken. It tastes really good, the chicken meat is tender, and the soup is great. The place is always crowded yet the service is quick. It's a little bit pricey but it's a must-try food in Semarang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Mariana Wijayanti
text:
Chicken was sticky & delicious. The sambal korek was garlicky & a great companion to the chicken & the rice, watch out it'sspicy. There's another type of sambal that is the default one. This one is sweeter & milder.

The concept is customer sits down, they bring a plate of chickens (breast & thigh) & fried liver & gizzard. You just take what you want.
Additional item you just order to the waiter.

For me, I think the oxtail soup is not up to my standard. I've had so much better ones.
The meat is not from the tail, carrots are still hard, soup is OK only.
Must eat the chicken! Don't bother about the oxtail soup.

Price is mid range, our group of 3 spent about 200k rupiah.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Rio Rinaldo
text: The fried chicken here is superb! The three of us ate the whole plate served that consisted of several breasts/thighs, livers, and gizzards. Don't forger to eat them with their sambal cobek and fried bitter beans. Their ribs and beef soup is also terrific. The place is not too big and always crowded and full. But even if you have to wait, it won't be long. People just come here to eat, fast.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: 王Junyu
text:
炸鸡是盐焗口味不裹粉直接油炸的炸鸡，还是挺好吃的，鸡皮炸的很软糯，口味就是纯的咸鲜。
牛肉汤好评，鲜美，牛肉软烂，还有一些香料味道，配合胡萝卜和土豆，泡点米饭进去，好吃！
橙汁不太行，感觉就是糖水+冰+一点桔子汁，不建议点，不如喝白开水。
价格不低，最后人均15.5万印尼卢比。
Cash only。

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ray Pramudi
text: Ayam goreng kampung, agak berminyak tapi nikmat. Plus Sop iga makin mantap 👍

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Rudiyanto Lie
text: Nicely fried; not dry but a bit soggy yet it is just fantastic. It's quite pricey for Semarang standard. The beef/oxtail soup is also really nice. You can't not over eat here.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ageng W leksono
text:
Great place to enjoy local cuisine... somehow adequate seating and you'll have to wait to be seated, but its worth the wait!!!
Dishes are amazing

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: J R
text: Empty plate means great meals

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: vyrla juniati
text: Fried chicken has its own unique characteristics with a very delicious taste plus spicy chili sauce adds a luxurious taste image.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sejahya Sales
text: One of the best tasting fried chicken in Semarang. Pair it with their delicious Sop Buntut (ox tail soup). Yummy, must try!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kiakiokiko Kiasatina
text: A legend in town. I love sambel bawangnya. Extremely hot, my fave. It’s really deadly delicious. Must try!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: wishing trees
text: Good food, starting when we came, they immediately offer a plate of rice then brought the fried chickens served and they will ask whether we want to try their oxtail soup or beef meat soup if yes, they brought it for you. Overall food are excellent, the soup taste were so tasty and delicious, full of beef broth. Fried chicken served always hot, meat full of taste and suitable with a hot rice in a plate.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ferani Inggrid
text: Will be coming again if visiting Semarang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ruth Novelia Yurike
text:
If love oxtail soup and deep fried chicken (flourless), definitely have to try this one. Place is open space so prepare for the sweat 😁
Fried chicken will be serve as you seat down, you just need to order the soup, beverages and sides, like fried pete!

Beef on oxtail soup is so tender, it melts in your mouth, and the soup is very refreshing. You can ask the chicken to be dry-fried (dunno if this is the correct term) so the skin is crispy.

If you are a chilli lovers, order their Sambal Bawang, its to die for!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: wisnubrata gatot
text: Great amazing culinary experience

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sapiderman Lumpat
text:
The place was jumping and busy when we came at 7pm. There was a queue. But what's impressive about this really busy place was that when a table was ready for us, it was  spotlessly clean!
Price: 4/5 pretty good. Around 600k IDR for 6 hungry adults, of rice (and the seconds!), soup and most of the chickens served. Well worth it.
Taste: 4/5 soup was gooooood, chicken soft and throughly seasoned.
Parking: 2/5 side street parking only.
Service: 4/5 faaaast!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Egi Septiadi
text: Came here for dinner, but not during peak hour, ard 8pm. The chicken is very tasty and the soup is rich in flavour and reenergize your soul and body after a long day. Price-wise is worth the taste and experience. Try coming during past the lunch/dinne hour, so you will not queue for so long. We did wait for about 20 mins for our food to arrive on the table which is still fine, but no queue prior to sitting in.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Joshua
text: Memorable one and definitely one of local fried chicken to try!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Arga Narada
text: There is a long queue here and people are waiting to eat here. Since I don't eat chicken so I tried the sop buntut. The taste is very authentic, you can tell that this comes from an old recipe that has been passed down for years. Just add up a few sprinklers of pepper and you're good to go

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ardi Oye
text: Very nice traditional Javanese fried chicken restaurant. Great taste & ambience. Try their famous "Sambal Bawang". It's the bomb!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dian Heryasih
text: Ayam kampungnya ok. Ga begitu oily dan empuk. Sambal ya ok banget!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: micko migura
text: The best fried chicken

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Orlando Ong
text:
Ayam goreng , sup bening daging sapi , sambal cobek and few plates of nasi putih will complete your lunch ^_^ , pay off after queuing ⏳

Other important thing : Remember cash only

Have fun and enjoy

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: andi yani
text:
Ayam Goreng Pak Supar is an absolute gem in Semarang! If you're craving authentic Indonesian fried chicken, this is the place to be. The chicken is perfectly crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, with a flavorful blend of spices that make it truly unforgettable. The sambal (chili sauce) is a must-try—it’s spicy, tangy, and complements the chicken perfectly.

The portions are generous, and the prices are very reasonable for the quality you get. The restaurant has a cozy, no-frills vibe, which adds to its charm. Service is quick and friendly, making it a great spot for a casual meal.

Don’t forget to try their other dishes like tempe and tahu goreng—they’re equally delicious! Whether you're a local or a traveler, Ayam Goreng Pak Supar is a must-visit for an authentic taste of Semarang.

Pro tip: Come early during peak hours as it can get quite busy!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Bray Wok
text: Everything was sobtasty n fresh here. The fried chickens & beef soups were the best in town..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: King H
text: Bustling... Good food.. Tender meat soup and firm tasteful marinated chicken kampong

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kimboy Jempol
text: The fried chicken, oxtail soup, meat soup was good. We arrived around 5.30 and waited around 30 minutes to dine in. Definitely would like to come back.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ricky Susilo
text:
Taste of Tradition: Semarang’s Legendary Fried Chicken

Nestled in the heart of Semarang, this long-standing restaurant holds the secret to perfect fried chicken that has delighted locals for years.

Known for its crispy exterior and juicy, flavorful meat, the fried chicken here is a true testament to culinary tradition. Each bite offers a nostalgic taste that brings back memories of family gatherings and simple pleasures.

Beyond their renowned fried chicken, the restaurant offers a variety of traditional sides and condiments that complement the dish perfectly. From fragrant rice to spicy sambal, every element on the plate is crafted to enhance the dining experience.

The ambiance is cozy and inviting, reflecting the warmth of Semarang’s hospitality. Whether you’re dining solo or with loved ones, the friendly staff ensures a pleasant visit with prompt service and a welcoming atmosphere.

While the restaurant may not boast modern decor or fancy presentations, it excels in delivering authentic flavors that satisfy both the palate and the soul.

In essence, if you’re in Semarang and craving a taste of local culinary heritage, this restaurant is a must-visit. Prepare to indulge in crispy, delicious fried chicken that embodies the essence of Semarang’s culinary tradition.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: indrawanid
text:
Ayam goreng dan sop buntut khas semarang ...
Tiada duanya..
Benar khas semarang

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: IRV
text: traditional fried chicken— good for quick meals.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Alexander
text:
First place to visit, every time landed in SRG!

To be honest, the best chicken in SRG, with Sambal Bawang.

Never tried the soup, as am a non beef.

Always, always, always. Recommended, recommended, recommended!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ratna Ayu
text: You must eat the fried chicken or ribs soup, it's really delicious.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Novianti Bagijo
text: ayamnya nyereseup pisan bumbu na.. sambal na seuhaaaahhh.. untung aya peuteuy.. sop na ge mantuuuulll..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Doni Rhdn
text: Ayam goreng kampung dengan cita rasa yang mantap.... Pilihan jeroan yang banyak.... Dengan pelayanan yang cepat... Ada pula sop daging dengan cita rasa home Made dan daging yang empuk.... Harga fair sesuai cita rasa

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Silvianti Dewi
text: Crowded! But the taste is better when you choose to dine in than takeaway..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: andika haruno
text: One of my fav Ayam Goreng Jawa. The service was quick. They will serve a plate full of chicken, and you'll pay only the portion you've eaten. The chicken was moist, tender and properly seasoned.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Hikmat Gumilar
text: Spicy food great chicken and oxtail soup. Pick the right dress or you will be soaked by your sweat. Get a number to get your turn to dine.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ervina
text:
The soup is very tasty and the meat is very tender 👍👍👍
U can request more dried for ayam goreng kampong

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: binsar sinaga
text:
I order Beef tail soup beside the fried chicken.
I think both, have special taste, however you need to queing to get your order.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Om Sid
text: The Chicken is sooo tender.. and the rice is one of a kind... enjoy it with chilli and crackers.. it's cheap too..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ansel Tambunan
text: Enak abis. Goreng basah + sambel korek!!! NGERIIII

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: edwin martin
text: Nice place to eat

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Rizaldy
text: So good, worth the price. The chicken is very flavourful and the oxfail soup is very tender

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Heinz Maruli
text: Rasa ok, mantab, ada 2 tempat ya berdekatan.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Roeby Ch
text: Original taste, a bit salty but it's ok for us

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Anwar Konggoro
text: I love the soup more than the chicken.... just try it!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ade Jolie
text:
Come here for late lunch. Service was fast.
However seat and limited, no aircon so expect a hot and humid air when you dine. Parking lot is challenging, on the side of the street and managed by local parkman.

However the food was great, I LOVE their chicken. Even both my daughters are enjoying their meals, they end up having 2 pieces of chicken and two plates of rice. Their soup also good, meat was tender and soft.

Price wise, i cannot say it's cheap tho..but still affordable. I ate 4 chicken, one soup, five rice, two orange juice, three ice tea and the total is 247K rupiah.

They're not receive non-cash payment like debit, cc or qris. So be prepared to have enough amount of cash.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: adi subagyo
text: One of the best ayam goreng in this town.. and don't forget the oxtail soup too..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ali Tafrihatullutfi (Kang Lutfi)
text: One of my favorites place in Semarang. Only about 15 minutes from Ahmad Yani Airport. The chicken is so tender and best combine with sambal bawang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Lilis Map
text: THE oxtail Soup is the best and the fried chicken is him ( asked them to re-heat to crispy fried chicken)

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Faisal Tjandraatmadja
text: Have to queue to get seats. Chicken taste is very good tough bit pricey for local dishes. Beef soup is authentic and taste very well

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Merdi Sofansyah
text: Waduuuh.. Jempol dua buat ayamnya.. Satu? Mana cukup..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: I Gde Agung Chandra S.W
text: Best friend chicken in town, the meat was so tender and juicy. You must order mixed vegetable soup too, because the broth is so flavorful. Just make sure you come not in the lunch time because it is always packed.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: R.K The
text: Known this place for more than 15 years...taste is still the same...1 of the best ayam gorenh in town..try sambel terasi..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: andria yusuf
text:
it's a simple restaurant , with no AC so yeah it's very hot there. But, their chicken tastes yummy. Although my favorite dishes is the meat soup, with its delicious broth, juicy and tender meat and enough spices to add up the taste.
because there were a long queing when i get there , the use queing number system.
my suggestion is be patient, your long waiting will worth it.
oh and its quite pricey .. not as affordable as i thought

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sardjito Imam
text:
It takes extra patience and energy to get a seat, long queues plus snaking street parking are common. Fast and friendly service, Savory and Rich Soup, Fried Chicken with the typical Semarang Seasoning that is Savory and Tender, combined with spicy sweet, savory shrimp paste, plus a small plate of Fried Petai... The taste is as bright as the world.
The price is not cheap, soup without meat is priced at 20K, soup with meat is 60K, while the fried chicken itself is priced at 25K per piece.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Muhammad Naufal Ariq
text: Jos

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ricky Pao
text: This one you should definitely try. The fried chicken is very tasty.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kingsen Yan
text:
The Infamous place for Ayam Goreng in Semarang.

Need to admit, even as someone who is not a fan of Ayam Goreng, the meat is super tender, with the Sambal and Soup, it was kinda perfect!

The downside is that, I still think it was overpriced

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sarah Wibiandini
text: The best local fried chicken in town! You must try it if you are in Semarang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: JJ JJ
text: Mak nyus. Ayam kampung nya lain drpd yg lain

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Emery Filemon
text:
Ordered their infamous fried chicken and their oxtail soup. Really tasty. Not just tender but also yummy. Must try their chilly sauce that is (thank God) not so spicy.

Price-wise is a bit pricey. A dinner for two will drain 100k from your wallet easily. But for such delicacy, this is way healthier than the fast food fried chicken chain.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Cassandra Alam
text:
I have already visited this place 2 times. First dine in and yesterday take out. The place for dine in not too big, so there are queuing in there.
The ayam goreng have a great taste, me love it and kiddos also. Ayam + sambal + their nasi are perfect combination !
The oxtail soup also good and tasty !

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: novtiyanto hendrawan
text:
One of the best Ayam Goreng i ve ever eat.
Always taste the same everytime I visit this resto, though the resto is not large either.
It will feed your belly with a memorable taste every single business / culinary trip.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Fatima Tudzahro
text:
Ayam Kampung: 22rb Perayam
Sop Daging: 50rb Perpiring (Kentang+Wortel+Daging Gde2)
Sambal Bawang: 5rb Percobek
Nasi Putih
Es Teh Manis
Teh Tawar
Es Jeruk

Parkir pinggir jalan. Makan siang agak antri. Soal rasa ruar biyasaa, bikin nagih 😍.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Adi Nugroho
text:
Been here for dinner we arrived @7PM and it was the peak time to have dinner.
After queue for other 3 number for about 20 minutes, then we hot our table ready.
The chicken was good taste with great sambal, though the oxtail soup was out of stock we can enjoy the warm beef soup.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Reyner Gunawan
text: Went for late lunch.. 3pm ish.. need to be put on waiting list, luckily, only 1 person before me.. love the chicken.. yummy.. i think i ate like 6 chicken its that addicting.. or maybe simply because there isnt a lot of option to choose from there. Alao have their fried intestines, also try their oxtail soup.. its okay, nothing really special, but still nice. No complain..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dinanda Nisita
text: The beef soup much more tasty! Tips: you could order half portion if you want

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ophi Ziadah
text: Fried chicken is so good. Cooked traditionally . I also has oxtail soup.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Estherine T
text:
We were there before 12noon on a Saturday and there were quite a number of people queuing up.

Pretty crowded seating and tables were very close to each other given this is a small place.

We got the Ayam goreng basah since it was not deep fried and it was sooo good! Chicken was tender and flavorful and I loved the Sambal Bawang uleg though not spicy enough.

Sop Buntut was just average for me since the focus was on the chicken. Giblets were tender as well.

This has to be listed on must-eat list in Semarang and I ordered to bring back to Jakarta as well and enjoy it at home.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Arif Frediyanto
text: Good food, taste is delicous both fried chicken and oxtail soup. The restaurant a little bit small, we have to wait to be seated. But overall OK.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: sony hartoyo
text: Ayam gorenge empuk, rasane uwenak tenan dicocol sambel bawang buat lali sama kanan-kiri

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: zulhaidir hamid
text:
A well known javanese style fried chicken in Semarang city. The chicken is juicy and taste so good. Don't forget to order the beef soup, it's complementary to the taste of the fried chicken and the combo will blow your tongue and also your cholesterol level 🤣🤣🤣
🤤

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: DT
text:
Really nice Oxtail soup .
Chicken is also really tender

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Adityo Pratomo
text: Delicious food, superb traditional fried chicken and scrumptious ox tail soup. Although the place is crowded and waiting time is quite long, prefer to take away instead

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Indah Pratiwi Setyawan
text: Great comfort food, check it out if you are into original fried chicken and beef soup. Be prepared to wait in line as they are extremely popular. We always come here whenever we visit Semarang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: sakti soemawinata
text: The food is good but the place is hot...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Wihandono Yogo
text: Recommended for its taste, but the price is quite expensive.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: hayunaji
text: Awesome taste!!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Abdul Rofik
text: Recoment buat yang lagi di Semarang yang cari makanan buat makan siang / malam

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yustisia Laras
text: Great taste! The best fried chicken and sambal bawang (+ fried petai) in town. You must try this if you visit semarang. The oxtail soup is also delicious, but the best menu is still fried chicken (kampung chicken) and sambal bawang, especially if you adding fried petai! The price is reasonable with the taste.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Mr & Mrs Budi
text: Sedap dan enak. Hidangan cepat walaupun entry agak panjang. Sbb resto ini menjadi pilihan masakan ayam yg panas dan sambal yg superp.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: meilani martini
text: My favourite fried chicken in town! The chicken is so delicious. It is served with sweet chili sauce or if you prefer the more spicy one, you can order sambal korek. The beef soup is also delicious. Must try!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Gabriel Marcel Aldion
text: Cant even describe with words. AMAZING! But the price is a lil bit expensive compare to the other fried chicken stall in town. But when you are in Semarang, this is one of the have-to-visit store. If you are a spicy junkie, try their onion sambal.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: V Y
text:
Semarang culinary at it best!

tasty chicken, tasty soup, a -MUST VISIT- place at Semarang.
yet the place was small and bit hot, but they'll offer delicate menu you cant refuse.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Hadi Wahyu Wibisana
text: I think the best "cow tail soup" 🤣 in Semarang. The meat is very tender, also the fried chicken is very gooood. A little bit expensive for college student and the place is rather small.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Eldo Delamontano
text: ayam kampung super.... nice choice if you mampir and have a meal

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: adi purnomo
text: Best ayam goreng in Semarang. Always come back while passing through Semarang. We like it a lot. Taste good and fair price. Recommended. The place is quite small but always crowded.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yusuf Reza Kurniawan
text: In my humble opinion, this is one of the best Kampung Fried Chicken (Ayam Goreng Kampung) in the whole country. Meat is tender and juicy, rice is cooked just right, and sambal is more on the sweet, rather than spicy side. The ribs (beef) soup is also excellent.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sherly Oktripani
text: Enakk siiii tp mahal wkwk but this is worth it 🥰🫶🏼

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Mila Ardja
text: It's always crowded here. You might have to wait to get the table to seat in. They serve a reaaaly nice fried chicken and meat soup here. I will recommend their sambal bawang / terasi (you should request them to the waiters since it's different with the ones they serve on the table). The food comes in fast so you won't have to wait long.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: James Tan
text: Nice local food. If you a fans of fried chicken. This is a place u must come when visiting Semarang. It has soft texture not crispy like KFC or MCD. But thats how the local ayam goreng should be like.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: sandy alva
text: For me, this is just a regular fried chicken. Their menu selections is really minimal. They only have chicken, Pete, Hati, and sop buntut. No tempe or tahu. It's a bit strange for me to eat chicken without any side dishes. But my friends are really love the taste.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kevin Kane
text:
The best Ayam Goreng in Semarang, period!
The only reason I visited Semarang is to go to Pak Supar and having Lumpia. Definitely worth every penny and time.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: M Fajar Syahwali
text:
Traditional fried chicken with yummy flavour, combined with rice, sambal and fresh cucumber. really good

second best menu is soup: oxtail or beef meat soup. Also tasted good.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: elisabeth nathalia
text: Tempat yang wajib didatengin kalo pas di smrg...ayamna gorengna mantaaap dgn sambel bawang (hrs pesen ya sambelnya)...klo sambel yg diksih sambel trasi...sop buntutna jg OK bgt...anak2 sukaaa...pokoknya enak semuaaaa

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yasser Wahyuddin
text: Uncommon experience to taste fried chicken. Not the crunchy one but more juicy with tastefull marinade javanesse receipt. I will not say the best javanesse fried chicken in town, it brings plenty of appetit.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Tara Annisa
text: Please don't forget to bring cash here

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Michael Munro
text: Very popular and very busy. Good quality chicken in a traditional (read local) shop. Very enjoyable.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Raden Arief Nugroho
text: They serve fried chicken (local type, different to McD/KFC) as their main menu, but still my fave dish is the oxtail soup. The best "sop buntut" (oxtail soup) in Semarang. The broth is oily though. Meaty and soft. They also provide a variety of sambal (chili sauce). Add them with "petai" (stinky beans), you'll crave for more.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: David Setiawan
text: The taste that never change, always good and definitely tasty!!! Been in this place since i was a little and they still keep on the good taste for both the chicken and the oxtail soup.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Terry
text: Oxtail soup is the best!! Down side is the place is rather small and too many people eat there, very noisy and hot. Avoid the eating time might help a bit

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Akbar Arfian
text: ayamnya sangat saya suka, apalagi dengan sambel bawang dan sop buntut nya. worth it buat harga segitu

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Andrew Darwis
text: Legendary Chicken by Mr Supar. Mr Supar is the suparman!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Prijono Tjakranegara
text: The place is small. Long queue at certain time. The Sop Buntut and the Fried Chicken is so delicious. Highly recommended and must try.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: M.Ekaditya Albar
text: Delicious

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kahfi Irawan
text:
The fried chicken are very Delicious,
If you want a lunch, make sure you arrived 30-40 minutes before lunch time, to avoided long queue.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ramy Dhia
text: A popular traditional fried chicken place, really crowded you might be put into the waiting list for the table. The chicken and sambal are really good. It's worth the wait.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Pramudya Wardhana
text: The soup is good, but the fried chicken is somewhat so so...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Septian Hardinata
text: Normal fried chicken and not too salty

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: fauzan wibowo
text: Great food but at a pricey ones. The oxtail soup is a must when you visit this place. The fried chicken is good too. Overall, I recommend this place

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Decky Kristanto
text:
The food is very delicious...
Fully customer crowd. I like the taste of the plain tea. Feel de javu.
Plus one, there's a sekoteng seller in front of this place. The taste is very delicious...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Hugo Koen
text: Even though to eat u have to queue with a number, but it’s really delicious! Yup, it deserves a legendary culinary title.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Haries Hermawan
text: Local fried chicken established in Semarang . The taste is so good, without preservative food. It's must-try food in this town

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dian prabandini
text:
Sop buntut nyaa ya Allah enaaaaakkk
Ayam goreng juga enak huhuuu bakal balik sini lagi

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Handriyani 17
text: yumm

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Andhika Kusumohartoyo
text: This restaurant serves fried free range chicken and ox tail soup which are very delicious and addictive. Parking is quite difficult in peak time.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: MP LIM
text: V v nice... The ampla superb

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ivaldi Fabtra
text: Great fried chicken, but the real champion is the soup. Super crowded during dinner hours with long queue, so get some snacks to munch on while waiting

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Roland Arifin
text: The best ayam goreng in town, super delicious and open till 10pm

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: widya
text:
Enak, ayam dan supnya enaakkkk..
walaupun tempatnya panas dan antri lumayan pas jam makan.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Bayu Winata
text: Wow, menu sederhana dengan citarasa istimewa..sambel nya mak nyuss..nice food. Unfortunetly, query is so long..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Wickz
text: Local fried chicken to die for!! And the oxtail soup also tasty n delish, it's a must to visit and eat here while u travel to semarang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: reggy priyanto
text: Super delicious fried chicken... with ribs soup

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yoniar Ramadhani
text: Favorite fried chicken in Semarang, tastes very good, usually crowded so avoid rush hour to eat on the spot

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Endah Sus
text:
Ayam nya biasa aja .. seperti rasa ayam yg lain",

Sambal bawang + usus ayam bole lah🖤

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Andri Fadillah
text: Original fried chicken. Taste is sweet. Their Sambal is top notch. Their sop iga also delicious

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Michael
text: Palayanan cepat dan bersih. Meja stainless

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: oksana sunu
text: Enak banget, ayamnya beda drpd yg lain. Walaupun sedikit agak mahal yaa

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Rachmat Gmail
text: Okey

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sekti Wicaksono
text: Good food, good service but quite pricey

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Adine Benedicta
text: Legitemately the best sop daging ever. Must to try menu. Fried chicken is good but not that special. Overall is good.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Hidayat Fiqhi
text: Makam malam disaat weekday....sangat ramai...untuk rasa enak saya suka...pantas kalau ramai...nice job

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Heryanfy Gunawan
text: So many people came here to eat, so you have to line up for a table. Great taste for all the foods and sambal bawang 👍

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: catur dewi
text: Tasty kampong friend chicken. You can request sambal bawang and sambal terasi on side. The oxtail soup is also good.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: andreas aristo
text: Yummy but pricey

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Shawn Ng
text:
Excellent fry chicken.

The chicken itself is spring chicken.

Fried to perfection.

And use good mix of herbs. Really enjoyed it. Must try.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: myrna savitri
text: Sup ❤️ ayam goreng ❤️ sambal bawang. Tipikal masakan dgn status terpuji tanpa cela 👌👌👌

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Imam Santosa
text: Very superb sop daging and ayam goreng. In case you are in semarang just try. it is one of my top listed food.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Arif Rahmat
text: best authentic fried chicken and oxtails soup in Semarang...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Tina Chavez
text: This is the best fried chicken in Semarang. So says the locals. I tried and I believed them. Delicious indeed.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Steven Setiawan
text: Good taste of Fried Chicken... Difficult to find parking spot for car... Also can't find it in Grab or Gojek Food yet...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Lulu elmuna

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Rita Ayuningtyas
text: Enak. Dulu ga ngantri. Skrg ruame buanget. Jd sabar-sabar nunggu aja kalau mau ke sini

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Afree Ary
text: Ok recommended

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: DaWe985
text: Tolle suppe, wie von Großmutter. Hünchen ausnahmsweise mal nicht frittiert.  Essen sehr lecker, aber lange Wartezeiten...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Febby Cha

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ihsan 'Azmi Fadhilah
text: Ayam goreng dan sop, ayam kampung tetapi seperti tidak digoreng, rasanya enak

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Jean-Marie Alves de Faria
text: Savory oxtail soup, great chicken. Be aware the place is fully packed most of the time.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: medhina indra purwhadi
text: Price has gone up, but the flavors still there, on of my favorite javanese style fried chicken

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sakti irawan
text:
The best ayam goreng ive ever eaten...
And super love the soup too!!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: ardiansyah ghozali
text: Enak tp mahal,lebih prefer ayam goreng bu toha di tuntang

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Rindi Nuraini (Aini)
text: Excellent taste and various choice of sambal

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Umar Toriq
text: Another level for fried chicken, you can also taste for meat soup, it delicious for different taste of local coulinary

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Iwan Taufik
text: lhaiki ayam goreng sing rasane bikin melayang layang.. Uenakk pol🤘
