title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Hendrawan Kho
text:
Pak Supar's Fried Chicken Stall

A fried chicken restaurant in downtown Semarang

Strategic location, but parking is difficult because it's on the side of the road, and it's quite busy and limited during lunchtime.

Seating at Pak Supar's stall is also limited, so you'll have to queue if it's full. There's another location about 50-100 meters away if this one is full.

The main menu is fried chicken, delicious seasonings, three types of chili sauce, and side dishes of liver and gizzard, stinky beans, and fresh vegetables.

There's also oxtail soup, with delicious, tender meat but the broth lacks flavor.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Bethania Ls
text: Waited for about 10 mins to sit at our table. So it’s not that bad. The fried chicken is really tender and juicy but for me it needs just a little more salt. The beef soup is amazing, i like the soup better.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Willy Alexander
text:
Remember the chicken served on the table,
pay per pcs. You don't have to eat all the chicken

The chicken it self is like "ayam pop". It's fried with low temp deep oil.

The chili is another level. If you dare to try.

The table is stainless, place is "open kitchen" and it's darn hot. The serve almost instantaneous. The que is freaking long.

You should provide air conditioning with that kinds of price 😁

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Santoso S
text:
Just an ordinary Fried chicken, nothing special of the taste.
The oxtail soup ok
Overprice compared with the taste

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Suci_ SR
text: Ayam Goreng kampung bumbu meresap meskipun ga goreng kering banget, ayam di hidang lengkap dengan ampela ati, bayar dihitung seusai  yang di makan.Sambal bawang nya mantap buat makan sama ayam goreng cocok buat yang suka pedas. Sup buntut sapi-nya enak, empuk dan kuahnya seger.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Fadhil Amadan
text:
Ayam Goreng Pak Supar offers some truly tasty fried chicken. The seasoning is spot-on, delivering a well-balanced flavor that leaves you wanting more. The crispy skin and tender meat make for a satisfying meal, and it’s definitely worth trying if you’re a fan of fried chicken. However, be prepared for a bit of a wait, as the place tends to get crowded, especially during peak hours.

We had to wait around 40 minutes, and while the food was great, the waiting time can be a bit frustrating. The bustling atmosphere adds to the sense that it’s a popular spot, but if you’re in a rush or looking for a quieter dining experience, it might not be ideal. Despite the long wait, the food lived up to expectations, making it a solid choice if you’re willing to be patient.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Mr. Oktavianus
text: First time visiting this resto and need to wait in pretty long queue due to limited seats and very high demands especially who come in groups and families. After waited for around 30 min, we got seated with another couple in one table. They only served two dishes, and we tried both of them, which were sop buntut and famous ayam goreng. They put one whole fried chicken on our table, and we could took the chicken part by ourselves to be counted in the end. They were well seasoned, tasty, juicy and still very hot (freshly fried). They came with standard sambal (a bit sweet and not spicy), so we ordered additional sambals (terasi and bawang) and came with tiny portion. Sambals were both spicy and tasty. It also enriched the taste and sensations in every bite. Sop buntut served with tender meat, however the soup tasted too light for me. I could not really enjoy it, but still Ok.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ian Otard Kognac
text:
Fried chicken is said to be the most famous in Semarang. In this restaurant there are only 2 menus, they are fried chicken and soup, you cannot request any changes for the menus (for example: if you want to ask for drier fried chicken, you still won't get it) because everything has already fried together before you sit.

Eating time is shorter than waiting time. It took us 40 minutes to wait for 12 queue numbers.

The taste of the chicken is delicious but in my opinion the chili lacks flavor and is not spicy at all. The cost for a piece of chicken and a portion of rice is 32.000 rupiah.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dhany Subroto
text: I did order 1 rice,  1 oxtail soup, 2 chicken, 1 liver, and hot lime. So do not surprise if the price is high for 1 person. There were 3 chunk of oxtail meats in the soup. Taste was okay. The chicken i ordered 1 wet and 1 crispy, personally wet is better than crisp. Everything just fine. Not bad but not at that good like in social media.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kresnodrianto
text: Quite good, please prepare cash as restaurant accept payment by cash only 👍

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: adie salto
text: Yoooo mayanlah. Senajan cah kene omahe kono, angger lewat ngerti nek rame, tapi kawit bayi mangan kene lagi ping 3. Roso sope yo isih awet enake, nek ayame byasah bgt. Larange yo awet 🤭. Ramene yo awet. Mayanlah nggo tombo pengen karo anget anget pas bar udan..👍

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Hendri hermawan
text: The fried chicken, a local legend, boasts a unique flavor profile that might surprise even the most seasoned foodie. It's a must-try dish for anyone seeking an authentic taste of Semarang's culinary heritage. If you're lucky enough to snag a table, be sure to request an extra fry for the ultimate crispy chicken experience. The hearty beef soup, a rich and savory concoction, is another standout dish. Simmered for hours, the broth is infused with complex flavors that will warm you from the inside out. And for those who crave a fiery kick, a dash of chili flakes can be added to any dish for an additional charge. Don't underestimate their potency, though - a little goes a long way! Whether you're a local or a visitor, this establishment offers a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in Semarang's vibrant food scene and discover the bold flavors that define this region's cuisine.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Joni F.
text: Famous for their fried chicken (marinated with coconut water) and oxtail soup. A must try food culinary list if you are in Semarang's area. Usually crowded with locals and tourist

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: fluorescent adolescent
text: decent food, quite pricey, long waiting time

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Krido Sadmoko
text:
This restaurant is unique, IMO, because they put a full plate of fried chicken as some kind of additional/side dishes. They count how many pieces you eat. The menu we have to order is the soup, ie, oxtail, veal, or beef offal/gravel as filling, as you order to the staff.
The soup is very tasty with the great meat tenderness, complete it with garlic chili sauce. Yummy.
The fried chicken combined with sweet chili sauce, it is superb. It would be perfect with pete goreng/fried petai. Wow!
Try them, but try to avoid the rush hour. It could be very crowded and made you wait to be seated.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Idame Kinanti
text: Simple yet flavorful taste of fried chicken. The meat is juicy and goes well with sambal. Served with oxtail or vegetable soup by request. The place isn’t big, so expect some crowd. Their service is quick, though.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Indah Triyani
text: One of culinary restaurants you have to go if we're going to Semarang. Salty taste of chicken combined with tender squishy chicken meat, delicious for any weather in Semarang. Try it

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: erly fitrianti
text: Overrated taste. Cash only. Not as my expectation but at least it is still recommended for cullinaire experience in Semarang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Mardea Mumpuni
text:
What i like about the food is the taste of the chicken is delicious, semi steam, so its not too greasy. The meat soup also refreshing, i like the taste of the spices mix with veggies and meat just right.
They only provide two menus which are : chicken n meat soup, it really speed up the process in the kitchen and system order.

What i less likely is the queue 😂 it took 55 minutes for us. But its still tolerable (as long as its not raining) because there is street food vendors that we can choose as appetizer before the main course 😁

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yan Putra
text:
Overall: 3
Taste: 3 (standard. Dont really understand the hype)
Cleanliness: 3
Contents: 3
Price: 💸💸 (quite expensive)

Everyone is recommending this place. But for me the chicken was too hard not juicy and taste was bland.
Seems the overall taste is relying on the sambal which i feel good.
Soup also good, cut for potato and carrot were big chunk and they give u alot.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: filipus Christian
text: The fried chicken is good but a bit pricey, about Rp. 21.000 for a piece at that moment. The beef and oxtail soup is tender and nice. It can be very packed and hard to park your car at the busy hour

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Annisa N
text:
One of the most popular dining place near DP Mall Semarang. We came at 4 pm and still need to register for waiting list, because this place was quite crowded.

The food overall is good🙌

This place also fits for family group dining.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Arie Kurniawan
text: The food taste is acceptable but I give more appreciation to its Chicken Sambal which is so delicious. Sadly the portion of these sambal is very little for the portion of whole dishes.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Faisal Akmal
text: Rwame, antri pas jam makan siang. Nek kon antri meneh g tak baleni😂

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Raymond Valiant
text: This restaurant specializes on beef soup and fried chicken. It started in 1974 as a street hawker. In general, the soup has a thick taste due to meat & marrow broth. The fried chicken however is rather dull and has an oily after taste.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Bram Alamsyah Tjahjadi
text:
They have a very delicious fried chicken, you have to ask the chicken to be more crispy (if you like) because their basic fried chicken served not that crispy (they only dipping it within minutes for the chicken), but to be honest I like it like the original taste.

They price?
When I visit it, the chicken will cost you 21K IDR for one part (it's around $2), and the oxtail soup will cost you around 50K IDR (around $4).

But they're all worth it, but the price will cost you 6K IDR (or around $0,5), and for me it's quite expensive.

You have to pick your visit time very carefully, if you're visiting them during lunch / dinner time, you may find yourself queue to be seated (just to be seated), and they don't have specific waiting room, so you'll just have to wait outside the restaurant,
Oh and don't expect you will be called if the place is available, so you have to be quick and steady (but not to interrupt other visitor though).

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Erma Irawati
text:
Beef soup and the fried chicken are tasty and yummy but little bit pricey

There is new branch about 100 meter  from Pak Supar 1st resto which is more spacey

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: renaldy gunawan
text:
Rame..sampai mst ngantreeee....mmng ayam gorengnya beda.....mak nyusss...gitu..
Sop buntut/daging habissss...tinggal sop sayurrrr.....

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ribka Adelina
text: Just not my taste because it's Ayam Kampung for the chicken. As for the service, don't expect smile or greetings from the people because you won't get it here. They barely even offer you the menu. All in all I can say I got fooled by those reels influencer for this one

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dedy Widjaja
text:
Pro : taste
Cons : price, too oily, cleanliness

Price : 3.5/5 (more expensive 20-30% compare to others)
Taste : 4/5
Cleanliness : 3/5

Tips : in my opinion, the fried chicken is not so special, just ordinary, too oily but for oxtail soup, it’s highly recommended eventhough the price is so expensive.

Always follow my reviews, it's trusted and objective

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Nita Kusnadi
text:
Ayam grngnya enak
Sup dagingnya kurang berempah

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Nafisah
text:
Although we arrived in the evening, we only had to wait for three numbers on the queue for less than half an hour. There was no air conditioning available, but the temperature was quite tolerable and not too hot.

The food was absolutely delicious and we even ended up ordering more. The chicken was only 25k per piece, and the oxtail soup was priced at 60k and incredibly tender. Hot orange juice was also a great addition to the meal and priced at 8k.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Nurlaili Izzaty
text:
Thumbs up for the authenticity.
Payment method is cash only, and seats are limited.
The oxtail soup tastes clean & the oxtail it self juicy and tender.
The ayam goreng tastes like comfort food in grandma's home. Red sambal a bit sweet. The sambal bawang is the signature. Powerful and spicy at its best.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Alexandra Josephina
text: Honestly, not my kind of fried chicken, i prefer it to be a bit more dry (is it undercooked or its their type of fried chicken), shoutout to their Sop Daging, totallyy loveee it. For 3 chicken, 1 beef stock soup, 1 pete, 2 rice and sambal + tea, it will cost you idr 160ish.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kick Jimmy
text: They had good sauce (chili) to acompany chicken. I have seen they had good experiences to cook the chicken.. half cooked to make sure we enjoy the chicken..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Shella Yuridasari
text: Fried chicken is good, but the rice portion is too small for some people. Crowds fill up the place so we're given que number. For

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Frans Enero
text:
Famous ayam goreng in Semarang, one tip to ask them to make it dry fried

👍🏼👍🏼....💸💸💸

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yoan Gabriela
text: Realky delicious. The chicken are well-seasoned Customers can choose either fried chicken with or without soup. There are two different kinds of sambal: "bawang" or "terasi", choose "bawang" if you like super spicy. The place is small and no psrking area (so park at the side of the road). Spend around 108k for 4 pieces of chicken, extra sambal bawang, mineral water, 2 glasses of tea.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Angela DIAN
text:
Tasty fried "ayam kampung" and "sup daging".
Rp. 330K for 7 people. Ice tea are included.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Lia Lt
text: The chicken tasted really good but too oily. There are not much of options actually. Only fried chicken and soup, bit I didnot try the soup.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Fin rita
text: The place itself is too small and crowded, but the positive point they got queue, even the waiting area is limited. The food is so so, but the service is quite fast. Kinda overrated.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Prasetyo
text: This oxtail soup is very tasty and unique, vegetable soup is available upon your request.  If you like spicy then ask for their sambal pedas, It will go well with the soup. Highly recommended local food.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: nelson fabian daquioag
text: Lucky we arrive before lunch time..The main menu choice is fried chicken and oxtail beef soup. Dont get fooled by the fried chicken pale and uncrispy look, its very tasty. The oxtail soup/sop buntut with potatoes and carrots rich beef broth complements the fried chicken and rice meal well. I definitely drop by again whenever in Semarang..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yosephine Sukma
text: Its the famous dish from Semarang. Fried free range chicken will never go wrong. The Garlic sambal was great..spicy.  but too spicy for people who dont like. I will definitely go back there..hmm but the price quite expensive though for locals. One piece is 20 thousands rupiah while mostly chicken is 10-15 thousands rupiah.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Betharia Aditama
text: curious to try due to always crowded when pass by. Taste is good, chicken is good similar to ayam pop, sop buntut taste so so.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kanya Hadyani
text:
All the drivers recommended this place when I was in Semarang

First of all… why does it taste like ayam pop? hahaha

It’s pretty normal, like other ayam kampung, but super juicy and well-marinated. The sambal bawang was crazy spicy—I couldn’t even finish it

The iga soup was tasty too, but similar to other places

So yeah, it’s just normal but still good. Oh, and heads up—you can only pay with cash! No QRIS, no ATM, no digital payment

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Adwina Marisa
text: crowded, I like this fried chicken...they also provide the oxtail soup, the taste is so so

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Eric Lanvin
text:
- Terlalu ramai
= Harga ok
= Rasa ok
+ Ayam kampung
+ Kuah ok

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Anita Djatmiko
text: Legend chicken rice in Semarang. I liked the sambal a lot! It was not spicy. The chicken was delicious. But I think the price was a little bit expensive. 27k for one piece of chicken, without rice. They usually crowded on lunch and dinner time.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Bayu Novianto
text: Call first for your order, especially for usus goreng dan jantung.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: alfian regusto
text: Tge place is a little narrow and not comfy at all, but the food worth the wait, money and the journey. Love semarang

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Melly Alida
text: The place is crowded, oxtail soup taste is good, and fried chicken is also delicious.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Agung FC, MD
text: good food but the place was small and crowd..but clean

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Brian Fam
text: Sop buntut and fried chicken. Taste great but the chicken i feel its abit pricey for road side stall. Abt 20k IDR per piece

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Rizki Ekananda
text:
One of the famous traditional fried chicken in Semarang, located in the middle of the city and always on the waiting list for lunch time and dinner. Similar to Ayam Goreng Berkah in Blok M Jakarta, they only have a half or whole chicken for the chicken menu and because they use organic chicken (kampung chicken) that is usually smaller than the regular chicken, the half chicken usually can be eaten by two people.  The taste of their chicken is very tasty and the spice can be tasted even in the breast meat. Their sambal is very spicy not like sambal that we can find in Ayam Berkah Jakarta, in this restaurant they used sambal korek or sambal bawang that  compliments the chicken very well.  The minus of this restaurant is that they don't have Nasi Uduk on the menu.  Many reviewers said that their oxtail soup was good too and we see that many people ordered that, we didn’t order that soup that day because we were already full with half of chicken and rice.  One of the restaurants that we must try if we visit semarang city.

Spicy: hot
Price vs taste: 5/5
Place: limited parking space if many customers come, park on the side of the road.  The table space is small considering the customer that they have are always full of pack so they usually has a waiting list line in front of the restaurant

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Andrew
text: Very good food, i ordered the ayam goreng and sup daging. The flavour is very nice. But the place is near a sewer so its kinda smelly

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Nicholas Stephanus
text:
(+) very nice fried chicken and superb beef soup.
The fried chicken itself is the moist type. So, if you like the dry crispy skin, this might not be the one for you, but worth a try because the combination of chicken and sambal is seriously good. The beef soup is the simple homemade type, but done perfectly.
(-) as expected at this kind of place, limited seating space, cramped and hot. But pretty clean.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: ViVi Disini
text: Tasty traditional fried chicken,delicious oxtail soup,best price worth to try

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Surya Wijaya
text: Now the taste of fried chicken is just ordinary, nothing special and the price is also relatively expensive, it's different from before... Maybe because it's too crowded now..

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Verga Kusumananda
text: Tasty and juicy chicken, nice broth of oxtail soup, and very spicy sambal here, and you can order their sambal bawang if you want next level of spiciness and saltiness. The place, ambiance, and atmosphere is great for family dinner, only if you can get enough seat in here. Price is a bit expensive for the same menu in other places.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: 劉家良
text: 熱門的三寶瓏當地餐廳，食材天然簡單，調味清爽。

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Desi Arul
text: Went here around 5.30 pm & already crowded. Price for chicken 25thousands/piece, you can request for a crispier version.  Chicken taste ok. The oxtail soup is really really good; pretty high price 65thousands for a plate of soup (not a bowl).

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Wiko Suhendra
text: Famous place for oxtail soup and tradisional fried chicken, finger lickin delicious, opened since 1974

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ignas Ridlo Anarki
text: Man, you have to try the beef soup, great one, 5 stars, the fried chicken 3 stars. Love it.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: rachmad Erland
text: One of famous culinary places in Semarang City. During busy hour you have to wait to be seated. Only 2 menu: traditional fried chicken and oxtail soup. Quite expensive.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yongki RS
text: The name of the store is ayam goreng pak Supar (pak Supar fried chicken) but the most popular menu is oxtail soup....

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Kosmas Suryapranoto
text:
When you come here, pick a queue number first. Then after seat available, you will be asked for how many people. Fried chicken will immediately available with default chili paste based on how many people in the seat. You can just eat it. There are 2 option of chicken frying, dry or wet fried. For dry, yiu need to request it.
The chicken taste great for me, but not for other. So, dont expect too high. Only 50% of my fam like the taste.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Margaretha Joseph
text: This was  the second time I tried this "Ayam Goreng" in Semarang. It was still yummy but not something you will miss! It was good but the soup is a bit pricey. The resto is tiny and crowded. The cleanliness needs improvement.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Irvan Ramadhan
text: Delicious and fresh food....but the fried chicken was little bit too oily for me...oxtail soup was tasty and fresh....

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ika Hapsari
text: My personal favorite is their rib soup although their main dishes is fried chicken. The rib itself texture is so tender and juicy, the taste is so rich and appetizing. No wonder if their small venue always full with visitors. But you have to prepare enough money because the price is quite expensive for a street food, but totally worth it

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Glen Lucius
text: This type of fried chicken is different, because it's not crispy or dry, even though they cook it like normal fried chicken. Taste is not so bad, worth trying but not to come here every other day. Service is average i guess, for small food stall like this. They count how many pieces you eat (they give you like 10 per table), make sure they count it right or you can pay more or maybe less.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Steve Kristianto
text:
Long queue for fried chicken ? This is the one.
Tender & juicy fried chicken are best enjoyed with hot rice and sambal.
Ox tail soup is very tender bu quite pricey

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: aditya surjosantoso
text: good fried chicken and oxtail soup, great sambal, overall okay but not special

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Amelia Tampubolon
text:
Surprise we had late lunch there 4 people price was 422.000
The menu only 8 pieces of chicken + 2 soups + 1 sambal + 1 teh manis + 2 teh tawar. Woow

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Damar Pracoyo
text: Great taste of Ayam Goreng and Oxtail Soup. The Ayam goreng has this classic tasty taste, down to the inner part, despite being a little bit oily coming straight from the frying wok. The soup has this thick broth and tastes so savory. Price is a bit on the high end range, 2021, IDR 100k/whole chicken and IDR 50k/portion.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Eryna Patadungan
text: Resto ayam goreng kampung yang renyah & lembut

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Jovanthegekko
text: Enak ayam goreng kampung nya

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Astrid Lim
text: The sop buntut daging is really really good. The fried chicken is ok, but the sambal is great. The place is almost always crowded though so please be prepared to wait or eat in a rush. Also, it's hot! But worth the experience.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Wing Wahyu Winarno
text: This resto serves fried chicken with very delicious taste. It is a very recommended place if you want to have a dinner. Unfortunately, it is a bit crowded during dinner time, because the resto only has 10 tables which can hold 6 guests each.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Salim Ezer
text: Best local fried chicken , rich local ingredients. Serve as street vendors but quite clean areas. Small space but worth with right price. The only thing the health protocol during covid is not strictly applied. At least during my visit.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Refah Gagrag Anyar
text: Delicious stuff. Definitely worth a try. The chicken is the right amount of tough, the gizzard is cooked into a softness that melts in your mouth, and the sambal is not too spicy and a little bit sweet. They also make crunchy usus kering from scratch (haven't tasted the oxtail soup yet).

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Tengku Mohammad Faiz Brifaldi
text: The soup was 9/10! Fried chicken 7/10!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dewinta Aqmarina
text: Soft and juicy (not the crispy one) traditional fried chicken. Combined deliciously with white rice and sambal and sliced cucumber. The place is always packed. Please keep maintain your own health protocol.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Roy K
text: definitely a must-go and eat resto when visiting Semarang! however, i humbly suggest that the resto add seating capacity as expansion is urgently required looking at the traffic of visitors and diners to this resto. Taste wise: one of the best in Semarang city!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Andreas Tjendro
text: The fried chicken is tasty. At 2pm they were still full house, and at 9pm still looked crowded. I had the meat soup which was also good. They also sell mangoes which are sweet.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Suseno Dermawan
text:
The taste is ok.
But considering the queues, i rather try first time and get kfc the next time.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ilham Sandri Koto
text:
ok, just a little not as expected.

very crowded both dining tables and roadside parking.  The sambal goes well with the oxtail soup with the fried chicken

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: pitri
text:
I went there to enjoyed their famous oxtail soup. Their soup and fried chicken was worth to wait. The line was long but it was worth.
The price is affordable for the delicious food

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Mas Agung Sachli
text: One of the food you have to eat if you come to Semarang city. When you dine in, you just need to order the side dish. The main dish, the chicken will be served on the table. You just pay what you eat.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Luna House Yogyakarta
text:
The taste is good.
The fried chicken looking unwell fry but OK.
The restaurant isn't big because in certain hour we have to queue.
This is pricy.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Egiii
text: Mantap ayam kampungnya, but lil bit pricey, saran untuk disediakan alat edc, utk debet. Tidak semua orang bawa cash banyak

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Vanessa Adinda Rahmadya
text: the queue was long, you will get the queue number, waited for around 45 mins… 100k+ for 2 people so it is a little bit pricey, but the food and the service was really nice.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: eddy kurniawan
text: good taste of fried chicken and matah chili. soup taste a bit bland, but the meat/oxtail felt great. there's petai/stink bean, which is a great value point.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Pratiwi p
text: Too long que, very hot as no canopy to wait. Taste is not as expectation. Ok to try but dont plan to be back again an as long queue.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Nina Sarwono
text: Best fry chicken and oxtail soup in Semarang. A little bit expensive but worth it. And always have a long line during lunch and dinner time

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dimas Renaldi
text: Enyak... Enyakkk... Enyaaakkkk... Cmn agak mahillll

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: dinno wartono
text: Rasa boleh lah.. pakai ayam kampung.. tetapi kok rasa nya makan burung dara ya saking mini nya ayam nya.. 😃

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Fabulous Marcia
text: The ayam goreng and sop buntut are delicious. I bet you will eat more than 1 piece of chicken...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Haris Setia Bangsawan
text: The fried kampong chicken was good, but not so good on the oxtail soup. The meat of the oxtail soup was not tender and a bit hard to chew.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Fransiska Ayulistya Susanto
text:
The fried chicken is good. But not for the other.
The service is fast but some of them is rude.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Hanto Syukur Seh
text: Come before lunchtime to avoid full crowded. Fresh hot petay chilly sauce called sambel pete and Semarang's hot weather will make you sweaty.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Tan Richard
text: Specialized in traditional chicken or we called it "ayam kampung". The size of the chicken are small but the taste are unique that many people like it.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Debbie A.S
text: Antri nyaaaaa....sop nya mantap berasa. Ayam nya biasa aja. Pelayanan nya ramah

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Gitano Prayogo
text: Enak tapi boleh diperluas tempatnya. Mantap

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Jeanny Kurniadi

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Andy
text:
OVERRATED

Review jujur dari saya, yang berkunjung kesini karena rekomendasi infonya legend.

Nilai Plus:
1. Rasa ayam enak, bumbu meresap.
2. Pelayanan cukup cepat
3. Antrian relatif juga cepat

Nilai Minus:
Harganya menurut saya overprice. Dari ayamnya, sup buntutnya apalagi. Rasa enak cenderung biasa, tapi ukuran, porsi, pelayanan, dan tempat menjadi satu kesatuan saya dalam menilai. Tapi melihat banyaknya yang makan dengan tempat yang sempit, mungkin dengan harga tinggi adalah jalan pintas yg dipilih supaya tidak over2 yang mau makan? Saya jadi maklum.

Tempatnya kecil. Jadi makan dempet2 penuh sesak. Non-AC, Non-Toilet. Dan yang terpenting CASH ONLY! Jaman sekarang tidak bisa QRIS/TF jelas bukan opsi yang bagus.

KESIMPULAN:
Saya makan sekeluarga 6dewasa 2anak habis sekitar 800k. Tidak menyesal mencoba. Namun saya belum ada keinginan untuk kembali lain waktu.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: deya
text: pas dateng ada antrian, tp ga terlalu lama nunggu, pembayaran cash only. menurutku rasanya kureng alias b aja.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Sari Hariyati
text:
1. ayam per potong 28k, rasa biasa aja,
2. antri banget, dan ternyata konsep nya sharing meja
3. sop 65k, empuk tp kuahnya hambar
4. ada 3 tong sampah sisa makanan di depan warung dgn kondisi tidak tertutup

menurutku overrated, masih byk pilihan ayam enak dgn harga lebih terjangkau

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Bang GG
text:
Tempatnya kecil, cuman saya tidak masalah
Namun banyaknya pedagang yang menawarkan makanan yg bisa masuk menurut saya terganggu sekali

Untuk makanannya sangat biasa dengan harga yang lumayan mahal
Tapi saya rasa ini soal selera, cmn menurut saya biasa sekali utk lidah org surabaya

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Dwi Anto
text: Rame sih smp pakai antrian tp mungkin selera aja, saya kurang suka ayamnya yg digoreng agak matang dan nasih lengket2. Bumbu ayamnya agak  krg buat saya

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Nathania Astria
text: Saat dtg jgn lupa minta nmr antrian ke pegawai, tergolong masih oke, tiba jam 20.20 dapat antrian ke-6, jam 20.50 baru dpt meja.  Semua meja dg kursi panjang untuk 4-6 orang namun sy hny dtg berdua, nantiny kami akn digabung dg pngunjung lain yg dtg sndri yg duduk sesuai antrian. Saat duduk langsung disajikan nasi sesuai orang, diserang pertanyaan utk tambahan order sop-sambal bawang-minum, serta disajikan sepiring ayam dg konsep ambil=bayar, serta sepiring potongan timun jepang. Ayam bkn selera kami, hanya sekilas terasa bumbu kuning kurang gurih, kami mengambil dada dan sayangny dagingny keras. Sambal standar yg disajikan tidak pedas lebih rasa manis dan petis. Setelah selesai makan bisa memanggil pegawai untuk menghitung total, pembayaran dilakukan di meja makan dengan cash only.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: joy charly
text:
Datang di hari Jumat menjelang makan siang (jam 12.15 wib).
Resto msh blm buka, tapi antrian sdh lumayn panjang. Dapat antrian no.16.
Pesan ayam goreng dan sop buntut.
Ayam gorengnya tidak garing spt ayam goreng kebanyakan.
Rasa sopnya juga relatif biasa saja.
Mnrt sy spt tempat ini over rated.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ema Sandra
text:
Konsep pelayanan makanan disini adalah kita cari tempat duduk dulu, kemudian akan ditanya mau pesan nasi berapa dan mau pake sop buntut atau tidak. Kalo sudah, nanti staf nya akan datang membawa pesanan tsb termasuk dengan ayam kampung (tanpa perlu menyebutkan mau pesan berapa, nnt akan dibawakan sama staf nya).

Ukuran ayamnya tidak terlalu besar, tapi untuk olahan ayam kampung harus diakui bahwa ayamnya empuk. Sop buntutnya pun berkaldu tp tidak berlebihan.

Sedangkan untuk harganya menurut saya masih kemahalan. 1 porsi sop buntu dihargai 65k dan paket nasi ayam dihargai 39k.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Tiara Uyun H
text:
Aku bukan turis yaa, aku warga lokal yg selama ini sih emg kalo lewat tu liat disitu selalu crowd dan bikin jalanan padet. Setelah mengumpulkan minat dan keinginan untuk nyobain, benerr rasanya B aja, yaa standar ajaa gitu ayam goreng sambel yang bukan yang wenak, tapi jg bukan yang ga enak. Standar aja. Tau yaa.... Ayamnya jg potongannya kecil,

Supnya jg standar banget tdk ada perbedaan apaa gitu yg bikin dia kok mahal, tdk ada perbedaan dg sup pada umumnya. Tdk ada ciri khusus yg membuat hidangan ini cukup spesial, Just literally sup pada umunya.

Poinnyaa, menurut kami : makanan yg kita dapet dengan harganya tidak worth-it, tdk affrodable, dan utk repurchase jg sepertinya No. So sorry.... krn diluaran ayam goreng yg lebih enak banyakk dan harganya separuhnya.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Erna Kartika
text:
Makanan biasa aja sih. Tipikal ayam goreng basah, cuma diungkep trus goreng nyemplung bentar doank.
Ayam gabisa milih part, nanti bakal disajiin sebakulan gini ada bbrpa potong, gak hrs diabisin, nanti byrnya dihitung brp potong yg dimakan mirip resto padang gitu.

Sop daging mayan pricey 60K, rasa biasa aja tp dagingnya empuk bgt sih. Mau maman mesti ambil no.antrian dulu. Khusus jumat jam 11.30 break sampai 12.30 baru buka lagi. Cuma bisa bayar cash. Pelayanan cepat. Makan ga bisa lama2 sambil ngobrol krn antrian udah panjaaang diluar.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Amalia Mufti
text:
Sop buntutnya dagingnya lembut, tp menurutku terlalu asin 😅 untuk ayam gorengnya pake ayam kampung dan digoreng ngga terlalu lama, jd bukan yg tipikal garing gitu. Oke sih bumbunya lumayan enak. Sambelnya ada terasi ada goreng, tp ku coba yg sambel goreng pas ke sini.

Overall, sebenernya biasa aja menurut aku.. tempatnya overrated bgt karena viral mungkin ya. Harganya juga lumayan: 1 sop buntut + 1 ayam + 1 nasi putih + 1 es teh manis + 1 ampela aja = Rp.100rb~ kira2 mahal apa murah? 🤔

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Lucia A.
text:
Ayam goreng : tipikal ayam goreng basah gtu ya, bukan yg goreng kering. Bumbu ayamnya di lidah saya kurang berasa,kurang mantap kalo buat lauk. Kalo digadoin tanpa nasi oke lah.

Sambal : tipe sambal manis, dan sori rasanya agak2 langu cabainya.
Jujur saja, kalo Saya agak kurang cocok dgn ayam dan sambalnya.

Sop buntut : enak bgttt. Dagingnya empuk kaldunya berasa bgt seger, wortel jg empuk. Recomended sop buntutnya sih. Wajib coba.

Parkir: susaaah bgtt. Krn cm pinggir jalan, mending dateng pake ojol deh krn parkirnya susah.

Pelayanan : kalo dibawa pulang cepet langsung dilayani saat itu jg tanpa antri. Karna ayam dll udah ready cm tinggal bungkus aja. Yg bikin antri lama itu antri tempat makannya, krn tmptnya bener2 kecil pol. Jd misal kita makan ditmpat kayak harus buru2 kelar krn d depan org antri panjang.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ans
text:
Buat yg pertama kali kesini jgn asal makan ayam goreng yg udah disajikan yes...coz yg disajikan di meja itu ga semua pesanan kita, jd emang konsepnya dilebihin gitu...dan dihitung berdasarkan apa yg kita udah makan...kmrn pesen ayam goreng 2 dikasih 4, karena porsinya kecil kirain 1 porsi tuh 2 potong 😆🤭 pas bayar agak kaget...ayam sekecil itu 28k...iya tau itu ayam kampung...tp buat saya tetap pricey bgt... 😁✌
Makan berdua abis 190k, nasi 2, sop daging 1, ayam 3, pete goreng, es teh manis 1. Dari semua menu yg menurut aku enak cuma sopnya aja, ayam gorengnya enak tp bukan yg terenak... Kaget juga ternyata sambel dihitung dan mehong pula...😅

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Rinno Wardana
text:
Salah satu warung makan terkenal di semarang.
Menurut saya overrated sih, rasa biasa aja untuk ayamnya, untuk sup nya juga biasa aja hanya kaldunya yg sangat berasa.
Pelayannya sombong2 dan tidak ramah.
Satu lagi, harganya sungguh overrated sekali. Minusnya adalah tidak ada daftar menu dan harga hehehe
Kalau berdua makan ayam dan sup siapkan minimal 150rb hehehe

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: sur_yoo
text:
Gimana ya menjelaskannya, over rated, makanan nya OK aj, ngak ada WOW factor nya gitu, daging ayam rasa gurihnya tipis, cara gorengnya bagus, ngak sampai garing masih moist gitu daging ayamnya.. sambalnya cenderung manis, sop buntutnya dagingnya banyak tapi lagi-lagi OK..
Sistem antriannya jelas, datang ambil nomer duduk di depan restonya tunggu dipanggil, pelayanan nya cepat dan orangnya ramah-ramah (beda banget sama toko-toko disemarang pada umumnya yang ngelayanin jutek dan ogah2an)

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Astri Windusari
text:
Tempat yang bersih dan teratur merupakan nilai plus di sini. Walaupun ramai tapi disediakan nomor antrian. Pertama datang, jika antri ambil nomor antrian. Ketika nomor antrian dipanggil baru kita bisa masuk ke dalam dan menempati meja untuk melakukan order. Rasa ayam gorengnya gurih dan tidak terlalu kering (kalau mau digoreng sampai garing bisa request) . Bahkan ati ayam dan ampelanya juga enak tidak terlalu bikin seret seperti karakter ati ayam biasanya.
Yang paling enak disini sambal terasinya 👍👍👍 perpaduan terasi dan cabainya pas, sehingga membuat sambalnya tidak terlalu bau terasi.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Tubagus Reynald
text: Waiting list yang agak kecewa, daging sopnya empuk tapi rasa kuahnya agak kurang dan ayam goreng tipe basah yang rasanya juga biasa aja 😔

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Iwan Jurnalis
text: Alhamdulillah nyobain menu kuliner yang beda lagi di semarang yaa teman2... Kali ini kita nyobain ayam goreng pak supar plus nasi dan sup sayur yaa... Nah untuk ayamnya itu gak terlalu besar yaa sepertinya ayam kampung jadi dagingnya empuk tapi gak terlalu ada rasa bumbu gitu yaa dan gorengnya juga gak garing yaa... Terus porsi nasinya juga gak terlalu banyak yaa alias cendrung sedikit... Untuk sup sayurnya agak beda yaa sayurnya gak dipotong kecil yaa, sayurnya itu setengah potong kentang dan empat potongan wortel, untuk kuahnya harus ditambahin sambel buat yg suka pedes...Nah disini itu gak pake lalapan yaa temans cuma dikasih beberapa irisan timun... Kalau untuk sambel standar aja yaa... Untuk minumnya seperti biasa teh manis hangat... Gak dapet JOERN

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Hendry Kurniawan
text:
honestly, ksini karena pernah coba makan awal tahun 2023 dan suka...
kemarin kesini lagi rasanya ekspektasi sy ketinggian. sy pesan sop daging dan ayam yang memang disajikan prasmanan
untuk sop dagingnya entah knapa rasany udh berbeda skali dari yg dulu. kayanya dl kaldunya berasa bgt, tp ini ga trlalu. enak sih, tp ga yg spesial bgt. ayamny jg digoreng lebih pucat. dl masih garing masih enak, kmren tuh bener2 pucat kaya belum mateng tp udh di angkat. enak tp ga yg enak bgt. kayanya perlu di review lagi deh. then yg utama dan PR banget karena ini udh lumayan terkenal yaa .. pembayarannya wajib CASH. gabisa trf atau qris. sangat tidak masuk akal sih pdhl harganya ga murah tp disuruh bayar cash yg org kmana2 udh jarang nenteng2 uang cash banyak di tas

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Arvan Rahman
text:
Rasa ayam biasa aja, diungkep dan digoreng sebentar jadi masih berasa bgt bumbu ungkepnya, Sop daging rasanya biasa aja, kaya orang baru bisa masak sop. Masih enakan Sop di tempat lain. Sambal pun biasa aja, nothing spesial.
Harga merujuk rasa jadi agak mahal. Tidak menerima cashless, hanya Tunai

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Pinyila
text:
Ayam langsung disajikan melebihi jumlah orang, jadi tidak perlu memesan. Sudah langsung dilayani di tempat duduk.

Untuk ayam goreng pak Supar (26.000/ potong), rasanya meresap sampai ke daging, tipe ayam goreng yang basah, bukan tipe kering dengan keremesan.

Sambal lebih ke arah manis, tapi tersedia juga sambal bawang (5.000) untuk yang menginginkan lebih pedas dan asin.

Sop buntut (65.000/porsi) kuahnya gurih kental kaldu, dilengkapi dengan potongan wortel dan kentang.
Tapi menurut saya cukup mahal, karena isi dagingnya sedikit.

Selain itu ada pelengkap petai, dan juga ati ampla (10.000/pasang)
Nasi (7.000/piring)

Saya makan ber4 habis 365.000

Antrian sangat fair karena diberikan nomer antri. Untuk tempat, saat siang hari terasa panas. Tapi, tempat duduk lumayan banyak jadi antrian tidak terlalu lama.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Andrew Tanardi
text: Mencoba ayam Goreng pak Supar karena rekomendasi dari berita kulineran. Tempat makan ukuran 1 ruko. Rame dan kalau datang di jam sibuk akan dikasih no antrian. Menu hanya dua: ayam goreng beserta pelengkap rempelo ati, kemudian sup daging. Ada penjual rujak di samping depan. Penyajian ayam cukup unik: bukan berapa potong tapi dikira kira berapa orang yg makan, kemudian ayam sekian potong diletakan di piring, nanti dihitung berapa yang dimakan (mirip seperti penyajian rumah makan padang). Sambal ada dua. Yg pedes dan tidak terlalu pedes. Untuk rasa ayamnya menurut saya ok saja. Tidak ada yang spesial. Sambal juga standart.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Moh Maliki
text: Buat saya yang ga suka makan ayam apalagi ayam kampung menurut saya ini termasuk yang rasanya enak, saran saya pesennya sop buntut. Dan itu dagingnya tebel banget...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Miss Marunduh
text: Maaf sy yakin ini ayam goreng nya enak bgt, cuma bukan selera saya. Sy geli lihat ayam yg di goreng pucat spt anemia 😂, jadi pengen sy taburin sangobion. Service cepat, klo gk pgn antri lama, dtg nya pagian jgn pas jam makan siang. Utk hrg lupa... Hrg turis lah mnrt sy

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Nevio Octavianus w
text:
Over rate
Dari segi ayam biasa aja
Sambal tidak pedas
Untuk sambal pedas di jual terpisah

HARUS SIAP CASH
KARNA DI SINI MASIH KUNO

Gk bisa QR & Debit

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: nur fitriah
text:
pas jam2 makan rame banget antrinya, karena belum pernah dan penasaran yauda coba ngantri. kesan2:
kayanya gak ada harga dan menu yang tertera jd kesannya agak khawatir di prank, duduk langsung dikasih nasi sejumlah orangnya, sambal dll. model makan ayamnya semi prasmanan tapi pay as you eat. meski begitu ternyata rasanya biasa aja, maksudnya ya enaknya ayam ya gtulah sama aja, tp karena gak digoreng garing dan masih panas rasanya emg lebih juicy. sambel yang sepaket kurang rasanya dan dikit banget, klo mau nambah sambel cobek bayar lagi 😆

-nasinya enak pulen tpi dikit banget untuk harga seporsi 6k, kayanya cuma secentong.
-ayamnya 25k per potong gak yang gede2 banget juga, mahal banget kirain spesialnya ayam kampung tnyata ayam biasa, diungkepnya juga standar bumbu2nya.
-sop nya lumayanlah worth it, 60k gak terlalu komen krn mgkin daging emg mahal
- teh manis 4k standar

ngalahin tempat makan di jakarta ayam+nasi+sambal+lalapan rata2 20-25K, rasanya ayam ya sama ajalah.

overall: 5/10
repurchase?: sorry no👎

saran: harga dituliskan biar konsumen gak zonk apalagi antriannya panjang banget

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: abtj
text:
Sop buntut. Oke.
Ayam goreng.. Ayam kecil. Rasa standar. Yang parah cara nggorengnya. Di wajan besar minyak tidak terlalu panas, ayam banyak dimasukin. Alhasil. Warna ayam pucat, tidak krispy, minyak dimana2. Ayam celup minyak

Untuk tempat yg rame. Meja makan termasuk bersih

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Icha Anggraenyy
text: Tempatnya Bersih,makanannya biasa ajaa,utk rasa yg enak sopnya,ayam goreng basah biasa ajaa smbl sdkt,nasi jg sdkt relatif mahal,pas dtg pas kebetulan lg ga antri,kl antri segala ambil nomernya kayanya ga deehh

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Verlyno Nyoto Handoko
text:
Cobain makan sini karena lihat review bagus2.. dan jg pernah lihat medsos, kayaknya enak..
Akhirnya kita cobain makan sini..
Kita datang akan langsung disuguhi 4 ayam goreng dan 1 sup buntut.. nasi sesuai request..
Menurutku ayam goreng b aja, ga se enak yg dibayangkan.. sup buntut empuk daging nya, tapi kuah nya rasanya b aja jg.. itu menurutku lho ya.. beda lidah beda rasa.. 😋
Suasana indoor non AC..  cukup panas klo siang.. sering rame disini, tambah panas.. 😄😄😄
Pelayanan cukup cepat, meskipun ramai suasana nya..
Parkiran mobil di sekitaran warung ini..
Kapan kita kesini lagi.. ga tau lah.. 😁

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yulia Margaretha
text:
Nyoba ayam goreng & sop daging nya mumpung di Semarang tempat nya sempit panas dan harus antri kalau mau makan sana

Ayam  goreng rasanya biasa aja,
Sop enak
Tp buat yg first time kesini wajib tanya2 biar ga kaget pas bayar 🤣
Terus cek struk belanja nya karna kmrrin di piring gaada hati cuma ada ampela Tp di nota di masukin sama bapk ny

BTW makan ber2 tanpa minum habis Sktr 267 rb
Pembayaran harus CASH!

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Ina
text: Rasa ayamnya biasa saja menurut saya..sekali lagi tergantung selera ya

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Indra Ramadhan
text:
Ayam goreng nya biasa aja.. Ga seenak yg dibayangkan.. Hambar.. Sambel bawang nya jg ga berasa bawang nya.. Pedes doank.. Smpe panas perut.. Masih lebih enak ayam goreng di bebek slamet.. Ketika dtg langsung disuguhin ayam 2 potong + ati ampela.. Ga ada pilihan ayam goreng basah atau kering.. Padahal yg ak liat di review2 ada pilihan itu.. Trus pesen minum es jeruk rasa nya hambar ga ada rasa.. Ga asem ga manis.. Seperti ga dikasih gula.. Akhir nya ak minta pelayan nya untuk dikasih gula.. Setelah dikasih gula langsung kemasnisan tu es jeruk..

Untuk sop nya si ak blm nyoba.. Mungkin itu yg bikin ni warung rame kali ya.. Tp ya perlu dicoba dulu

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: LV,2
text: Coba karena liat video tiktok makan sini .. menurut ku sih ayam goreng & sop dagingnya ok saja, Kurang wangi bumbunya.. Harganya lumayan $$ . Ternyata banyak juga kuliner ayam goreng & sop daging di Semarang. Tempatnya termasuk bersih.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: riansyahptr
text: Tolong karyawannya di ajarkan untuk lebih sopan sama customer jangan sering pura2 engga denger and belagu, agak heran kenapa restoran rame begini masih aja pakai cash , Qris sama transfer engga bisa hhhehe  please adaptasi sama perkembangan teknologi biar mempermudah customer

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Anastasia Yules
text: Untuk tempat saya rasa AMAT SANGAT BERDEMPETAN. Nggak ada physical distancing sama sekali. Punggung kami bisa bersentuhan dengan pengunjung lain. Beberapa tempat lain di Semarang yang saya kunjungi sayangnya begitu. Lalu ayam yang disajikan, walaupun baru saja diangkat dari penggorengan, tetap disajikan secara 'komunal' seperti masakan padang (pre-covid), yang kalau tidak habis akan disajikan lagi. Meskipun akan di goreng ulang atau entahlah, itu sangat tidak higienis apalagi di masa pandemi seperti ini. Soal rasa, ayam goreng nya mungkin sudah melegenda di Semarang. Namun menurut saya nggak ada yang terlalu spesial selain ayamnya empuk dan sambelnya enak. Sedangkan sop buntutnya, porsi cukup besar, daging sangat empuk dan kuah bening. Terasa ringan dan nggak ber rempah seperti sop buntut kebanyakan.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Arif Rahman
text:
Masakannya enak, tapi enak biasa bukan yang enak banget. Bagi saya yang biasa makan di warteg atau padang 10ribuan, kurang cocok makan diwarung ini, karena antri. Iya hanya karena antrinya doang yang membuat saya gak pengen kesini lagi.

Tapi antrinya itu yang mungkin membuat warung ini viral...

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Otong Surotong
text: Posisi rumah makan dipinggir jalan, jadi tidak ada parkiran khusus. Pelayanannya cepat dan ramah, tapi jangan harap datang langsung dapat tempat duduk. Menu utamanya Ayam goreng dan sop buntut, rasa ayam gorengnya biasa tapi sop buntutnya enak. Tapi jangan kaget harga disana tidak sebanding dengan rasa dan tempatnya. Mahal buanget, perorang rata rata bisa hampir 70 ribu. Saran saja sih bagi yang ngasih bintang banyak, biasakan berdoa sebelum makan.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Arka Atyanta
text: Hemmm sorry bgt jauh bgt sama ekspektasi, ternyata cm jd ayam turis bukan yg mantap🙏

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Valina Nidya Puspitaningsih
text: Overated, rasanya kurang worth it buat nunggu sampai waiting list dan rasanya sangat biasa sekali, pembayaran merepotkan karena cash only kalah sama warung pinggir jalan bisa pake QRIS, cukup pertama dan terakhir kesini.

title: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut/ Daging Pak Supar
name: Yan Yuliana
text: Ayam enak layanan cukup ,cuma tempat nya kurang bersih dan agak bau pesing maaf ...
